The Army has issued a request for information to acquire 120 reconnaissance and surveillance helicopters, while the IAF needs 80, aiming to modernize its fleet and enhance operational capabilities after decades of delays.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-seeks-200-copters-to-replace-ageing-cheetah-chetak-fleet/articleshow/123196628.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-seeks-200-copters-to-replace-ageing-cheetah-chetak-fleet/articleshow/123196628.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 03:10:49 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>RAJAT PANDIT</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="524488" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123196736,imgsize-524488.cms"/></item><item><title>Heavy rain in Delhi-NCR: Flights delayed, roads waterlogged; IMD warns of more showers</title><description><![CDATA[Delhi and the NCR experienced heavy rainfall on Saturday, leading to flight delays and cancellations, with approximately 90 flights affected and several areas waterlogged. The IMD has forecast continued thunderstorms and rain throughout the day in the capital.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/heavy-rain-lashes-parts-of-delhi-ncr-flights-delayed-roads-waterlogged-imd-warns-of-more-showers/articleshow/123199240.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/heavy-rain-lashes-parts-of-delhi-ncr-flights-delayed-roads-waterlogged-imd-warns-of-more-showers/articleshow/123199240.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 07:11:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1940638" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123199229,imgsize-1940638.cms"/></item><item><title>'Could have used better language': Ex-Aussie star weighs in on Gambhir–curator clash</title><description><![CDATA[Matthew Hayden commented on Gautam Gambhir's heated exchange with the Oval pitch curator, Lee Fortis, during India's training session. Hayden acknowledged Gambhir's frustration with perceived restrictions but suggested he could have used better language. Greg Blewett echoed the sentiment, recalling similar frustrations and noting the language used wasn't ideal, despite India securing a series-levelling victory.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/could-have-toned-it-down-former-aussie-cricketer-weighs-in-on-gautam-gambhircurator-oval-showdown/articleshow/123199306.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/could-have-toned-it-down-former-aussie-cricketer-weighs-in-on-gautam-gambhircurator-oval-showdown/articleshow/123199306.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 07:26:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="70826" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123199310,imgsize-70826.cms"/></item><item><title>Happy Raksha Bandhan 2025: Top 50 wishes, messages, and quotes; share with your siblings</title><description><![CDATA[Raksha Bandhan, a cherished Indian festival celebrating the sibling bond, falls on August 9, 2025. The festival emphasizes love, trust, and protection between siblings, marked by tying a rakhi. The article provides 50+ heartfelt messages and quotes to share with siblings, along with ideas to make the celebration extra special, whether near or far, fostering deeper connections.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/events/happy-raksha-bandhan-2025-top-50-rakhi-wishes-messages-images-greetings-card-gifs-facebook-whatsapp-and-instagram-status-and-quotes-to-share-with-your-siblings/articleshow/123182792.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/events/happy-raksha-bandhan-2025-top-50-rakhi-wishes-messages-images-greetings-card-gifs-facebook-whatsapp-and-instagram-status-and-quotes-to-share-with-your-siblings/articleshow/123182792.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 05:54:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="31220" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123182940,imgsize-31220.cms"/></item><item><title>OpenAI CEO Sam Altman at GPT-5 launch: India is our second-largest market</title><description><![CDATA[OpenAI has launched GPT-5, its most advanced AI model, boasting significant improvements in accuracy, speed, and reasoning. CEO Sam Altman highlighted India as a rapidly growing market, potentially surpassing the US. GPT-5 is available in various sizes and tiers, including a free version, with enhanced versions for Team, Enterprise, Edu, and Pro users, marking a step towards Artificial General Intelligence.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/openai-ceo-sam-altman-at-gpt-5-launch-india-is-our-second-largest-marketbut-what-users-are-doing-with/articleshow/123178437.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/openai-ceo-sam-altman-at-gpt-5-launch-india-is-our-second-largest-marketbut-what-users-are-doing-with/articleshow/123178437.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 08:15:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="20958" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123178434,imgsize-20958.cms"/></item><item><title>Amid escalation with US, PM Modi and Putin back India-Russia ties</title><description><![CDATA[Amidst strained US-India relations due to trade disputes over Russian ties, PM Modi and President Putin reaffirmed their commitment to strengthening India-Russia relations. Modi expressed support for resolving the Russia-Ukraine conflict through diplomacy and invited Putin to India for the annual summit.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/amid-escalation-with-us-pm-modi-and-putin-back-india-russia-ties/articleshow/123195257.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/amid-escalation-with-us-pm-modi-and-putin-back-india-russia-ties/articleshow/123195257.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 00:02:08 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SACHIN PARASHAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="869262" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123195252,imgsize-869262.cms"/></item><item><title>WTC glory needs specialists, not stopgaps — Gambhir must rethink his approach</title><description><![CDATA[Under Gautam Gambhir, India have played 15 Test matches, winning five and losing eight, including an embarrassing series defeat at home to New Zealand, their first in 12 years. His red-ball tactics have raised eyebrows; his rigidity in prioritising batting depth over balance, and his decision to keep Kuldeep Yadav on the bench, cost India a golden chance to bury the Bazballers once and for all. India did manage to draw the series, thanks to a spirited performance by the extraordinary skills of Mohammed Siraj, but they should have beaten toothless England.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/wtc-glory-needs-specialists-not-stopgaps-gautam-gambhir-must-rethink-his-test-approach/articleshow/123198606.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/wtc-glory-needs-specialists-not-stopgaps-gautam-gambhir-must-rethink-his-test-approach/articleshow/123198606.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 06:19:40 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>PRATYUSH RAJ</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="148282" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123198659,imgsize-148282.cms"/></item><item><title>India won't bow down to anybody, says Piyush Goyal</title><description><![CDATA[Piyush Goyal asserted India's resilience, stating it won't bow down to anyone and will capitalize on global trade restructuring. He expressed confidence in India's economic strength and ability to find opportunities amidst crises like potential Trump tariffs. Goyal highlighted India's growing global recognition and attractiveness as a market, dismissing concerns about its economic status.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-wont-bow-down-to-anybody-says-piyush-goyal/articleshow/123196865.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-wont-bow-down-to-anybody-says-piyush-goyal/articleshow/123196865.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 03:36:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="851278" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123196894,imgsize-851278.cms"/></item><item><title>An entire country is shifting to Australia, as first planned migration is underway</title><description><![CDATA[Tuvalu, a Pacific island nation, faces imminent submersion due to rising sea levels, prompting a groundbreaking planned migration. A treaty with Australia allows 280 Tuvaluans annually to gain permanent residency, accessing essential services.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/an-entire-country-is-shifting-to-australia-as-first-planned-migration-is-underway/articleshow/123165321.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/an-entire-country-is-shifting-to-australia-as-first-planned-migration-is-underway/articleshow/123165321.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 16:36:10 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="59922" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123165348,imgsize-59922.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Ashwin's cheeky take on IPL rumours leaves Samson, fans in splits</title><description><![CDATA[Ravichandran Ashwin cleverly addressed IPL trade rumours in a new video, engaging Rajasthan Royals skipper Sanju Samson in a humorous exchange about potential team switches. Ashwin joked about trading himself to stay in Kerala, while reports suggest Samson's unhappiness with RR and CSK's interest in signing him. Apparel exporters are also pressured to shift US production elsewhere.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/shoemakers-take-measured-steps/articleshow/123197004.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/shoemakers-take-measured-steps/articleshow/123197004.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 03:47:33 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ASMITA DEY</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1497474" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123197037,imgsize-1497474.cms"/></item><item><title>Careers in tech: Google CEO Sundar Pichai to youngsters; I believe that best employees are...</title><description><![CDATA[Google CEO Sundar Pichai, now a billionaire, emphasizes the importance of self-criticism and embracing discomfort for professional growth. Launched in August 2024, it has seen low registration numbers. Out of 13.9 lakh doctors, only 996 have registered. Many applications are pending approval. The initiative aimed to strengthen digital healthcare. Registers for nurses and paramedics are also planned. However, progress is slow.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/only-996-of-13-9l-allopathic-doctors-in-nmr/articleshow/123195978.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/only-996-of-13-9l-allopathic-doctors-in-nmr/articleshow/123195978.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 00:43:40 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>REMA NAGARAJAN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="22422" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123195987,imgsize-22422.cms"/></item><item><title>NFL star Tyreek Hill and ex-wife Keeta's baby Capri rushed to ER; now on the mend</title><description><![CDATA[Tyreek Hill's eight-month-old daughter, Capri, was rushed to the emergency room after developing alarming symptoms, causing significant concern for her mother, Keeta Vaccaro. Then apologise: EC official to Rahul</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/no-declaration-on-oath-then-apologise-ec-official-to-rahul/articleshow/123196493.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/no-declaration-on-oath-then-apologise-ec-official-to-rahul/articleshow/123196493.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 02:02:33 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>BHARTI JAIN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1843997" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123196508,imgsize-1843997.cms"/></item><item><title>Congress functionaries back Rahul Gandhi's 'vote chori' accusation, opposition allies join in</title><description><![CDATA[Following Rahul Gandhi's "vote chori" expose, the Congress party is launching a nationwide campaign to highlight alleged irregularities in the electoral process. State units will screen Rahul's press conference, and Mallikarjun Kharge will discuss a national offensive on "election fraud" with party leaders.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/congress-functionaries-back-rahul-gandhis-vote-chori-accusation-opposition-allies-join-in/articleshow/123196438.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/congress-functionaries-back-rahul-gandhis-vote-chori-accusation-opposition-allies-join-in/articleshow/123196438.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 01:44:09 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SUBODH GHILDIYAL</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="927189" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123196443,imgsize-927189.cms"/></item><item><title>Rahul Gandhi's 'false narrative' rejected thrice, will be ignored again: BJP</title><description><![CDATA[BJP refuted Rahul Gandhi's rigging allegations in Maharashtra polls, stating Congress won seats with increased voter turnout. Union Minister Bhupender Yadav cited Election Commission data, clarifying a 40 lakh voter increase, not one crore as claimed.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/rahul-gandhis-false-narrative-rejected-thrice-will-be-ignored-again-bjp/articleshow/123196465.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/rahul-gandhis-false-narrative-rejected-thrice-will-be-ignored-again-bjp/articleshow/123196465.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 01:50:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1465065" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123196486,imgsize-1465065.cms"/></item><item><title>Robert Vadra got 3.5 acre Gurgaon land as bribe, ED tells court</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/robert-vadra-got-3-5-acre-gurgaon-land-as-bribe-ed-tells-court/articleshow/123195630.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/robert-vadra-got-3-5-acre-gurgaon-land-as-bribe-ed-tells-court/articleshow/123195630.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 00:23:17 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>PRADEEP THAKUR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="2028505" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123195636,imgsize-2028505.cms"/></item><item><title>Monsoon session: Parliament proceedings washed out again amid opposition stir</title><description><![CDATA[Both Rajya Sabha and Lok Sabha faced disruptions due to opposition protests demanding a discussion on Bihar's special intensive revision of electoral rolls. The deputy chairman of Rajya Sabha rejected notices for suspending business, leading to uproar and adjournment. Despite the chaos in Lok Sabha, some questions were addressed, and the Income Tax Bill, 2025 was withdrawn for revision.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/monsoon-session-parliament-proceedings-washed-out-again-amid-opposition-stir/articleshow/123196531.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/monsoon-session-parliament-proceedings-washed-out-again-amid-opposition-stir/articleshow/123196531.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 02:18:39 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1914136" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123196569,imgsize-1914136.cms"/></item><item><title>NOTA can't be treated as candidate, Centre tells SC</title><description><![CDATA[The Centre has strongly opposed the Supreme Court's examination of whether 'NOTA' can be a rival candidate when only one candidate is contesting. The government argues that 'NOTA' is merely an option, not a candidate under the Representation of the People Act, 1951. They also clarified that the right to vote arises only when a poll involves multiple candidates.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/nota-cant-be-treated-as-candidate-centre-tells-sc/articleshow/123195427.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/nota-cant-be-treated-as-candidate-centre-tells-sc/articleshow/123195427.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 00:09:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DHANANJAY MAHAPATRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="940631" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123195449,imgsize-940631.cms"/></item><item><title>SC: Intention wasn't to cast aspersions on HC judge</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sc-intention-wasnt-to-cast-aspersions-on-hc-judge/articleshow/123195829.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sc-intention-wasnt-to-cast-aspersions-on-hc-judge/articleshow/123195829.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 00:33:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DHANANJAY MAHAPATRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1288108" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123195865,imgsize-1288108.cms"/></item><item><title>EC increases remuneration, honorarium for poll duty staffers</title><description><![CDATA[The Election Commission has increased the remuneration for officials and staff involved in conducting elections. Presiding officers will now receive Rs 500 daily, while polling officers will get Rs 400 per day or a lump sum of Rs 1,600.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ec-increases-remuneration-honorarium-for-poll-duty-staffers/articleshow/123196399.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ec-increases-remuneration-honorarium-for-poll-duty-staffers/articleshow/123196399.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 01:33:19 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>BHARTI JAIN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1061207" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123196409,imgsize-1061207.cms"/></item><item><title>'I’d have to get the police involved': Dwyane Wade revealed why his first marriage fell apart</title><description><![CDATA[Dwyane Wade's personal life faced turmoil before his marriage to Gabrielle Union. His previous marriage to Siohvaughn Funches ended in 2008 amidst accusations of domestic violence and a difficult co-parenting relationship. Wade and Union briefly separated in 2013, during which he fathered a child with another woman, but they reconciled and married in 2014.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/id-have-to-get-the-police-involved-dwyane-wade-revealed-why-his-first-marriage-fell-apart-before-meeting-gabrielle-union-in-his-2020-documentary/articleshow/123195642.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/id-have-to-get-the-police-involved-dwyane-wade-revealed-why-his-first-marriage-fell-apart-before-meeting-gabrielle-union-in-his-2020-documentary/articleshow/123195642.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 00:37:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1266132" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123195803,imgsize-1266132.cms"/></item><item><title>SC: Panel led by retd HC judge to manage Banke Bihari temple</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sc-panel-led-by-retd-hc-judge-to-manage-banke-bihari-temple/articleshow/123196125.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sc-panel-led-by-retd-hc-judge-to-manage-banke-bihari-temple/articleshow/123196125.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 00:57:40 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DHANANJAY MAHAPATRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="2443745" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123196138,imgsize-2443745.cms"/></item><item><title>SC to examine validity of BNS 'sedition' provision</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court is set to review the constitutional validity of Section 152 of the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita (BNS), which deals with sedition. A petition challenging the provision, filed by retired Maj Gen S G Vombatkere, argues it mirrors the contentious Section 124A of the IPC.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sc-to-examine-validity-of-bns-sedition-provision/articleshow/123196299.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sc-to-examine-validity-of-bns-sedition-provision/articleshow/123196299.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 01:14:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DHANANJAY.MAHAPATRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1065329" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123196307,imgsize-1065329.cms"/></item><item><title>'Tired script': EC slams Rahul's 'vote theft' claim; cites 2018 SC decision</title><description><![CDATA[The Election Commission (EC) has strongly refuted Rahul Gandhi's allegations of voter fraud, labeling them a repetition of old, baseless claims. The EC challenged Gandhi to either substantiate his accusations with formal verification or apologize to the nation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/tired-script-election-commission-slams-rahul-gandhis-vote-theft-claim-cites-2018-kamal-nath-case/articleshow/123190510.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/tired-script-election-commission-slams-rahul-gandhis-vote-theft-claim-cites-2018-kamal-nath-case/articleshow/123190510.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 19:38:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="898882" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123190638,imgsize-898882.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Rudrastra’: India’s longest freight train with 354 wagons hits tracks; Watch video</title><description><![CDATA[Indian Railways has launched 'Rudrastra,' its longest freight train ever, stretching 4.5 kilometers. Composed of 354 wagons and powered by seven locomotives, the train was formed by linking six standard rakes. It journeyed from Ganjkhwaja to Garhwa Road, covering 200 km at an average speed of 40 km/h.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/rudrastra-indias-longest-freight-train-hits-tracks-354-wagons-linked-7-locos-power-4-5-km-run-watch-video/articleshow/123194237.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/rudrastra-indias-longest-freight-train-hits-tracks-354-wagons-linked-7-locos-power-4-5-km-run-watch-video/articleshow/123194237.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 23:28:16 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="3305967" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123194350,imgsize-3305967.cms"/></item><item><title>Shubman Gill's mic-drop moment: 'I want to be the best'</title><description><![CDATA[Shubman Gill's stellar performance in England, amassing 754 runs and leading as the top scorer, has garnered praise, with Dinesh Karthik highlighting his technical improvements and composed media handling. Gill addressed doubts about his overseas form with conviction, notably shining in the second Test at Edgbaston with a double century and a hundred.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/shubman-gills-mic-drop-moment-i-want-to-be-the-best/articleshow/123192564.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/shubman-gills-mic-drop-moment-i-want-to-be-the-best/articleshow/123192564.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 22:21:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="37390" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123192627,imgsize-37390.cms"/></item><item><title>Billy Howton former Green Bay Packers star and NFLPA founder passes away at 95</title><description><![CDATA[Billy Howton, the Green Bay Packers' legendary wide receiver and NFL Players Association founder, passed away at 95. He revolutionized the game, becoming the first rookie to achieve over 1,000 receiving yards. Howton's efforts to establish the NFL Players Association secured better rights and pensions for players, leaving a lasting legacy.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/billy-howton-former-green-bay-packers-star-and-nflpa-founder-passes-away-at-95/articleshow/123193910.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/billy-howton-former-green-bay-packers-star-and-nflpa-founder-passes-away-at-95/articleshow/123193910.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 23:16:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="647430" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123193839,imgsize-647430.cms"/></item><item><title>Education Bill passed in Delhi Assembly; fee hikes in private schools to be regulated</title><description><![CDATA[The Delhi Assembly has passed 'The Delhi School Education (Transparency in Fixation and Regulation of Fees) Bill, 2025', granting the government more control over private school fees due to significant fee hikes in the 2025-26 academic year. Schools must now get approval for fee increases and disclose all charges, with penalties for non-compliance.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/delhi-assembly-passes-school-fee-regulation-bill-2025-rejects-aap-amendments-enforces-strict-rules-penalties-for-arbitrary-hikes/articleshow/123191971.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/delhi-assembly-passes-school-fee-regulation-bill-2025-rejects-aap-amendments-enforces-strict-rules-penalties-for-arbitrary-hikes/articleshow/123191971.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 22:00:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="212743" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123192573,imgsize-212743.cms"/></item><item><title>'I will surrender': BJP MP Dubey after FIR filed over 'forcible' temple entry</title><description><![CDATA[BJP MP Nishikant Dubey and others, including Manoj Tiwari, face charges for allegedly forcing their way into the Baba Baidyanath temple's sanctum sanctorum in Deoghar. A priest's complaint alleges the group's actions, violating restrictions during 'Shravan,' hurt religious sentiments and caused a disturbance. Dubey claims he's being targeted for performing 'puja' and intends to surrender.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/i-will-surrender-bjp-mp-nishikant-dubey-after-fir-filed-over-forcible-temple-entry-booked-for-performing-puja/articleshow/123191372.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/i-will-surrender-bjp-mp-nishikant-dubey-after-fir-filed-over-forcible-temple-entry-booked-for-performing-puja/articleshow/123191372.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 20:56:10 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="669129" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123191604,imgsize-669129.cms"/></item><item><title>'Seems fake': EC asks Tejashwi to surrender 'false EPIC'; says 'it is a legal offence'</title><description><![CDATA[The Election Commission has declared the EPIC card presented by RJD leader Tejashwi Yadav as "fake" and demanded its submission by August 16. This action follows Yadav's demand for accountability from the EC regarding the issuance of two EPIC numbers to him.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/epic-trouble-for-tejashwi-yadav-card-shown-to-media-seems-fake-says-ec-asks-him-to-surrender-it-by-august-16/articleshow/123190633.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/epic-trouble-for-tejashwi-yadav-card-shown-to-media-seems-fake-says-ec-asks-him-to-surrender-it-by-august-16/articleshow/123190633.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 19:54:51 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="517911" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123190794,imgsize-517911.cms"/></item><item><title>Boost to defence: India to replace aging Chetak, Cheetah choppers; 200 light helicopters planned</title><description><![CDATA[The Indian Army is gearing up to replace its aging Chetak and Cheetah helicopters with 200 modern light helicopters, as indicated by the defence ministry's recent request for information. This initiative aligns with India's Aatmnirbhar Bharat campaign, emphasising indigenous defence manufacturing through partnerships between Indian companies and original equipment manufacturers.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/boost-to-defence-200-modern-light-helicopters-planned-for-army-air-force-replacing-aging-chetak-cheetah/articleshow/123191256.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/boost-to-defence-200-modern-light-helicopters-planned-for-army-air-force-replacing-aging-chetak-cheetah/articleshow/123191256.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 20:26:51 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="15616" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123191660,imgsize-15616.cms"/></item><item><title>Travis Kelce & Taylor Swift absent at funeral; his father Jason Kelce attends alone</title><description><![CDATA[Ed Kelce held a memorial for his partner, Maureen Maguire, who passed away at 74, in Gladwyne, Pennsylvania. Jason Kelce and his wife Kylie attended, but Travis Kelce was absent due to Kansas City Chiefs training camp. Taylor Swift, currently on her "Eras Tour" in the UK and Europe, was also not present.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/travis-kelce-and-taylor-swift-misses-family-funeral-while-jason-kelce-stands-alone/articleshow/123191257.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/travis-kelce-and-taylor-swift-misses-family-funeral-while-jason-kelce-stands-alone/articleshow/123191257.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 20:26:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="31068" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123191240,imgsize-31068.cms"/></item><item><title>Amid standoff with US, Modi speaks to Putin, says he’ll host him this year</title><description><![CDATA[Following NSA Ajit Doval's meeting, PM Modi spoke with President Putin, inviting him to the annual India-Russia summit and reiterating India's call for a peaceful resolution to the Russia-Ukraine conflict. Putin briefed Modi on the war's developments. Both leaders reviewed bilateral progress and reaffirmed their commitment to strengthening the India-Russia partnership.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/amid-standoff-with-us-modi-speaks-to-putin-says-hell-host-him-this-year/articleshow/123190332.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/amid-standoff-with-us-modi-speaks-to-putin-says-hell-host-him-this-year/articleshow/123190332.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 19:15:12 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="994312" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123190341,imgsize-994312.cms"/></item><item><title>How to deal with Trump? Netanyahu says he has advise for PM Modi - will share on one condition</title><description><![CDATA[Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has offered India assistance in navigating US tariffs, suggesting he'd privately advise PM Modi on dealing with President Trump. He highlighted the effectiveness of Israeli weapons used in Operation Sindoor and expressed willingness to enhance India's surveillance capabilities to combat cross-border terrorism.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/will-advise-pm-modi-on-how-to-deal-with-trump-israeli-pm-benjamin-netanyahu-claims-israeli-weapons-used-in-operation-sindoor/articleshow/123185070.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/will-advise-pm-modi-on-how-to-deal-with-trump-israeli-pm-benjamin-netanyahu-claims-israeli-weapons-used-in-operation-sindoor/articleshow/123185070.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 14:52:19 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="929890" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123185373,imgsize-929890.cms"/></item><item><title>75+ heartfelt Raksha bandhan wishes, messages, and quotes for 2025</title><description><![CDATA[Raksha Bandhan celebrates the cherished bond between siblings with love, memories, and protection. This collection offers over 75 wishes and quotes to express heartfelt emotions, from playful greetings to emotional reflections. It includes blessings, funny messages, and thoughtful lines for sisters and brothers, perfect for long-distance celebrations and sentimental moments.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/events/75-heartfelt-raksha-bandhan-wishes-messages-greetings-card-gif-facebook-instagram-whatsapp-status-and-quotes-for-2025/articleshow/123121210.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/events/75-heartfelt-raksha-bandhan-wishes-messages-greetings-card-gif-facebook-instagram-whatsapp-status-and-quotes-for-2025/articleshow/123121210.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 21:00:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1800474" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123121265,imgsize-1800474.cms"/></item><item><title>Elon Musk updates Mars mission timeline: Starship crewed by Optimus possible in 2026; real target now 2028–2030</title><description><![CDATA[Elon Musk has adjusted SpaceX's Mars mission timeline, pushing back the potential Starship launch to 2028 for an uncrewed flight and 2030 for a crewed mission. Technical challenges, including Starship failures and delays in mastering in-space propellant refuelling, have contributed to this shift.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/elon-musk-has-made-an-announcement-starship-flight-to-mars-crewed-by-optimus-in-nov/dec-next-year/articleshow/123164458.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/elon-musk-has-made-an-announcement-starship-flight-to-mars-crewed-by-optimus-in-nov/dec-next-year/articleshow/123164458.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 16:45:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SCIENCE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="15064" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123164687,imgsize-15064.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <description><![CDATA[Revenue from operations grew 15.5% to ₹4,347 crore, up from ₹3,763 crore in the year-ago quarter. Profit from operations stood at ₹454 crore, a 9.2% increase from ₹416 crore in Q3 FY24. Shares of Siemens Ltd ended at ₹3,030.75, down by ₹88.25 or 2.83% on the BSE.]]></description>
